posts.post_content:
1909 T206 (hands at side) - Rube Marquard - "rookie" - PSA 2 - $70

Sweet Caporal 150 back suggests that this was produced in 1909, thereby making this Marquard's rookie card - - especially considering that only one Hall's Studio Cabinet Marquard is known to exist and given that the date stamp (1908) on the Hall's Studio Cabinets was a complete guesstimate.

Price includes insured shipping + paypal fees, etc. First to e-mail "I'll take it" to [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] has rights to the card. See my collection (link below) for other cards I'm selling including (but not limited to):

E90-1 Jennings GAI 1, 1921 Schapira Bros. Babe Ruth SGC 30, 1923 W515 E. Collins SGC 50, 1927 W560 Grove SGC 84, 1928 W502 Combs SGC 70, and 1932 Orbit Gum Pins Dean
